title: Strengthening Learning Design Practical Competencies: Analysis of Higher Education Teaching Methods Utilizing Technology: A Practitioner Competency Enhancement Workshop

context.prior_knowledge: 5+ years of practical experience in mathematics, basic proficiency in online learning platforms
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Three or more case studies can be analyzed on the application of innovative technological tools (e.g., AI tutoring systems, virtual laboratories) in mathematics education.
Two or more technology-based instructional methods (e.g., interactive whiteboards, real-time polling tools) can be designed and demonstrated to engage learners in real-time online environments.
Five or more core elements of international standard educational classification systems (e.g., Key Information Set) can be explained for reference in corporate practitioner training design.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
